definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: male, i. q. [[זׇכָר]], but only c. sf.;—coll. [[כָּל־זְכוּרְךָ]] Ex 23:17 = Ex 34:23 (both JE), = De 16:16, of attendance at feasts; [[כָּל־זְכוּרָהּ]] (of city refusing terms of peace) De 20:13 commanded to be slain (opp. [[הַנׇּשִׁים]], [[הַטַּף]], etc., v:De 20:14).
